body_html:
Hi,
Might be helpful for some of the people that are having the same problem.
A small workaround for this problem that I am using is changing the driver model from WDDM to TCC.
Doing it by
nvidia-smi -dm 1

body:
Hi,
Might be helpful for some of the people that are having the same problem.
A small workaround for this problem that I am using is changing the driver model from WDDM to TCC. 
Doing it by 
`nvidia-smi -dm 1`
